Text: Fwd Frank Smith Memorial Golf TournamentJamespst Returnpath From Fullname HanHSmith MessageID Date Thu May EDT Subject Frank Smith Memorial Golf Tournament To MIMEVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundarypartcadbbeacaboundary XMailer AOL for Windows US sub Jim Hannah and I are so appreciative of your efforts in establishing the Frank Smith Memorial Golf Tournament at the annual Enron Law Conference The joy you have brought to our daughter through this gesture is immeasurable and we believe after the initial mortification at having his name on anything that Frank would have been thrilled about it in an understated way of course but thrilled nonetheless Heartfelt thanks for your involvement and contribution to this effort I am sending either attached to this email or separately depends on challenges presented as I am hugely incompetent in this area the email we received from Dave Nutt explaining the evolution of the tournament It is a ringing endorsement of your efforts and character and I think you should be aware of it We thank you for remembering in such a loving way one of the finest people God ever put on this planet Sue Smith PS Please let me know if you receive Daves letter attached to this email sorry LtrAFSHannahdoc
